casebody.data:
Byron K. DODDS, Appellee, v. GREAT LAKES TRANSIT CORPORATION, Appellant. No. 120. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 18, 1935. Brown, Ely & Richards, of Buffalo, N. Y. (Laurence E. Coffey and W. Alexander Eldridge, both of Buffalo, N. Y., of counsel), for appellant. Henry Fogler, of Buffalo, N. Y., for appellee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
